page.title: 15The Councillor - 2
page.content: Mrs.Errington is upset by the{litter {problem}in{Ringwood}and worried by the slow progress in sorting out the{ {traffic}(chaos every Wednesday,{market {day.}) Very upsetting is the continuing occurrence of dreadful car accidents at{Picket Post}where westbound traffic hits cars emerging from the{Burley}road. Councillor Mrs. Errington likes District Council work more than County Council; she is not paid but receives an "attendance allowance". Recently, Mrs. Errington's brother,{ {Philip Ziegler,}published the official biography of{Lord Louis Mountbatten,} but she did not give us her opinion of the book as she hasn't finished reading it yet. Finally, Mrs.Errington said she hoped to see our school, Ringwood County Junior, modernised soon!
